content: **materials ** ▪ worsted weight yarn in yellow grey pink ▪ felt in red ▪ e hook 3 50 mm ▪ stuffing ▪ 6 mm safety eyes ▪ scissors ▪ tapestry needle ▪ felting needle **difficulty ** easy you should know how to work in the round increase decrease and change colors the final piece should measure approximately 2 5 tall this is an icrochetthings original pattern © 2014-2016 do not claim as your own do not copy sell or distribute this pattern do not sell any products made from this pattern
